file_content.text: Our peace is fading. The skies aren't safe anymore.
Master Jedi, honored. Flight Commander Judin, Republic Navy.
Flight Commander Judin, sir. I've heard all about Havoc Squad, and it's an honor.
Move along, citizen--oh, sorry, Captain. Flight Commander Judin, pleased to meet you.
Ah, good, I've heard all about you. Flight Commander Judin, Republic Navy.
Afraid there's bad news from open space. The Imperial armada's attacking Republic assets in secret, goading us into violating the Treaty of Coruscant.
Give in to their taunting, and the Republic will have the blood of a galaxy on its hands.
We must control our fleet.
Don't worry, Master Jedi. We're taking measures to prevent war.
One false move on our part, and the Republic will be blamed for igniting war.
A clever plan.
Yes, Master Jedi. But we'll never let them succeed.
The Republic's too strong to give in to their bullying.
The Imps will fail.
We're taking aims to ensure that, sir.
Just like those Imps to avoid an open fight.
Treacherous snakes.
They're scum, all right. Scum we can beat.
What's the Treaty of Coruscant?
The Treaty of Coruscant?
The peace agreement between the Republic and the Empire? Our scraps with the Imps need to stay away from major worlds--for now.
The longer we sit on our hands, the more time the Empire has to consolidate its power.
So break the treaty.
That may be, but if we break the treaty now, the entire galaxy will turn against us.
Fleet Admiral Numinn has authorized the formation of the Coruscant Aegis--an elite attack squadron meant to break the Imperial offensive, swiftly and quietly.
If you're interested, I'd say you're more than qualified to join the squadron.
I would be honored to fly with the Coruscant Aegis.
I accept.
I want to be called "Crackerjack." Eh, that sounded better in my head. How about "Ace"?
Yes! Can I pick my call sign?
"Ace" it is.
Make it squadron leader, and I'm in.
I deserve to be in charge.
I'm... that's... fine. Squadron leader it is.
I suppose I should.
Excellent, Master Jedi.
As a defender of the Republic, your call sign shall be "Shield."
Every pilot needs a call sign. I think "Guardian" suits you best.
Glad to hear it, sir.
Your call sign will be "Meteor." Just the name for a member of Havoc Squad.
Wise choice, Captain.
As for your call sign... I think "Ace" suits your nature.
Good. I knew you'd be up for it.
Every member of the Coruscant Aegis will strike independently across the galaxy. I'll upload your mission data to your ship.
Silence the Imperial threat, and guard the Republic well.
The Imperial fleet's readying for something... but what?
